column3: For lifetime CO2 emissions, GEM assumes an average lifetime of 35 years, based on the global average retirement age of 37 years. If a coal plant is older than 35 years, GEM assumes 5 additional years of operation. If a plant has a planned retire date, GEM assumes the plant will cease operating that year.
column4: "Estimating carbon dioxide emissions from coal plants" (GEM.wiki)
